title: Issue disconnecting in game? (please read)
body:
We have seen your posts here,  around random disconnects, while playing League over the past few days. Today we found something that may have contributed to this, we have addressed it, and we are now monitoring.

So far, it does look promising, but we won't really know until we give it 24 hours. We are sorry for the pain this has caused you all, and we will update with more info, as soon as we have it.

-Riot Cochese

replies.body: Could you explain what it was?

We will explain more for everyone, we just want to make sure we actually found the issue first. Sorry for being so vague, I mostly wanted to share the theory, and then get a better gauge overnight. Based on player reports and our monitoring, we should know if this helped.

I'll keep you posted Horse of Force.
Better to get the news out first than to actually say what's going on, I guess?

Oh, cool.

Shows you that you have to *triple* check the settings before implementing new hardware!

Dear Sir Riot Cochese,

I played all good for 4 games just NOW , then at end of the 5th game I got attempting to reconnect and then the firewall error (with failed to connect message) popped up again. 

Ty for your help, I was able to play 4 games and because I got disconnected again I might get a ban. Another player in my team in the same game got disconnected and was lagging hard too. she afked for about 25 mins, going active and inactive most of the time.

We pretty much gave up that game, and fighting a loosing battle.  

Ty for looking into this issue, Sir.

I highly appreciate your help on this matter.

Thanking you

That's a bummer to hear. A number of things can cause something like that to happen, but we are doing our best to make sure our infrastructure is running as great as it can.

Can you please run this test: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tools/network-logs

Then ship that info over to ocelivereports@riotgames.com so we can look into it. If you add "for Cochese, from Godsmustbecrazy3 in the subject, I'll find it easier. (cool summoner name btw, I loved that movie)
